response.original_title: TÝR - A Night at the Nordic House
response.overview: TÝR delivers a stunning show performed live with the Symphony Orchestra of the Faroe Islands.  This special event was recorded at The Nordic House in Tórshavn, the Faroes on February 8th, 2020. This seismic live album will be available on Metal Blade Records on 2 LP (gatefold, with insert, poster, digital download), a 2 CD/DVD digi-book set with 12-page booklet, and everywhere digital music is sold on March 18th, 2022.
response.tagline: TÝR delivers a stunning show performed live with the Symphony Orchestra of the Faroe Islands.
response.title: TÝR - A Night at the Nordic House
